title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1069/86 of 8 April 1986 amending Regulation (EEC) No 950/68 on the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 1069/86
of 8 April 1986
amending Regulation (EEC) No 950/68 on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Common Customs Tariff annexed to Regulation (EEC) No 950/68 as last amended by Regulation (EEC) No 3679/85 is hereby amended as indicated in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 15 April 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 8 April 1986.
For the Council
The President
G.M.V. van AARDENNE
(1) OJ No L 351, 28. 12. 1985, p. 2.
